<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.76

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add a weapon to a unit. Infantry units can only carry weapons in their respective slots (primary, secondary and handgun), the [[addWeaponGlobal]] command will replace the weapon currently in a slot with the added weapon if it shares the same slot. This command can link items to respective slots as well, in which case the functionality is identical to [[linkItem]].

To make sure the added weapon is loaded and ready, add the magazine first.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Warning </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command is broken when used on dedicated server</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object '''addWeaponGlobal''' weapon

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object : [[Object]] - Unit or vehicle to add the weapon to

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> weapon: [[String]] - Weapon class name

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>{
	_x [[addMagazineGlobal]] "Laserbatteries";
	_x [[addWeaponGlobal]] "Laserdesignator";
} [[forEach]] [[allUnits]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>{
	[[if]] ([[typeOf]] _x == "O_Heli_Attack_02_black_F") [[then]] {
		_x [[addMagazineGlobal]] "38Rnd_80mm_rockets";
		_x [[addWeaponGlobal]] "rockets_Skyfire";
	};
} [[forEach]] [[vehicles]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[removeWeaponGlobal]], [[addWeapon]], [[addMagazine]], [[addMagazineGlobal]]
</value></part></template>
